vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#7-19):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_8.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_8.sol#18)
	- userBalances (patch_8.sol#17)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_8.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#7-19):
	-(success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() patch_8.sol#14
